title: Gentler Streak for Apple Watch improves heart rate monitoring, adds widgets for iPhone app
content:
A few weeks after adding non-conventional workouts to its Apple Watch app, Gentler Streak is back with another important update by improving heart rate monitoring during exercises plus bringing the long-awaited widgets support for iPhone users.
